name: Spotify Web Player Toggler
description: This extension switches tabs between Spotify's Web Player and the most recently open tab. If the Web Player isn't currently open in any tab, the extension opens it in a new tab. Click on the extension icon or use the keyboard shortcut (Command+Shift+S on Mac OS, Ctrl+Shift+S on Windows/Linux/Others) to toggle.

toggle-webplayer.description: Switch to or away from the Spotify Web Player.
